info.name: Peptide Moisturizer
info.description: What it is: A nourishing-yet-fast-absorbing daily moisturizer that helps support skin barrier function and improve the look of fine lines.

product_variants.variant_description: A nurturing yet fast-absorbing daily moisturizer with a peptide duo that helps support skin barrier function.

reviews.review_text: Iâ€™m being generous with giving this 3 stars. I wanted to love this but it broke me out and left my skin feeling greasy.
